reviews.text: Hidden Jem !! Excellent food & juice. Service was also great. Perfecly priced. Will visit soon.

Was looking for a juice bar near me to support my new diet. Found this one and got a juice and their shrimp wrap. Everything was sooo good! This is my new go to spot. I'm going to try their acaia bowls next. The staff was really nice also.
The guys who made my Acai bowl was super sweet! He was quick and the Acai bowl was filling :)!!

So My coworker and I walked to the establishment today at lunch time after calling in both orders. When we get back to work we realize both orders are mixed up and one order that was supposed to be salmon was not. So I called and spoke to the short brown skin woman and explain. We agreed that my co worker and I would go in on Monday to get our free meals. Well low and behold this woman shows up at my job with both of our orders done correctly!!! Talk about customer service and going above and beyond!! I didn't order anything else as our break was over so seeing her show up for us was amazing!!! I will see her on Monday to give her a tip on top of the hug I gave her. She was in a rush to get back to the store so no time then. I work in Customer service as well so to get it back the way I give it deserves a 5 star review!!!!

Price increase?! No more loyal points?! My a√ßa√≠ bowls went up $5 and they took away my loyal points before even using them. Or letting us know. Definitely WAS my go to spot, Great staff! Great food all around. I will no longer be coming here as I can get my bowl for the same price and loyalty points at any gentrified spot in the city. Lost a very loyal customer, no way anyone spent more than me weekly ‚úåüèæ lovely staff! Will miss the staff!

Although I love a√ßai bowls, I wouldn't go to this place, much less recommend it. The service is terrible. I arrived, had to wait for the two ladies to finish what they were doing, and then served me. When I realized I'd been there for almost 25 minutes, I asked about my order. One of the two ladies responded rudely, and I instantly matched her energy. The manager has no authority there. Like I told you, your business may be great, but with such poor customer service, I doubt people will support you. The lady told her boss, "By the way, she's Honduran," referring to me. And I am Honduran, very proud of it, and very well-educated. They need to improve their customer service and also clean and organize their establishment. Terrible service!

Not worth the trip back. Just happened to be in the area for work & wanted a treat. Paying the bridge toll, costing just as much as the drink itself, makes no sense. Maybe I'll try again, if I'm in the area in the next few months.

They guy working in the back has great customer service. The man taking orders is a joke seriously. I placed my order over the phone I was told the price was $27.85 for 3 items when I got to the store to pick up.. my price doubled to $43.50. My food didn't come the way I placed my order. There is no broccoli or Chimchuri sauce my meal is very dry. I called to ask what happened just for the guy to tell me the broccoli is done. Which he still decided to make me pay my money just for a bunch of peppers that I don't eat. He told me i can come back next time , i dont not plan on ever going back to spend money with this place, I am Very upset
My salad isn't what I thought. This place is way to pricey and I did not get what I wanted with my food.

One of the best place to eat Acai bowl! My obsession.

I really wanted to support this local restaurant, but unfortunately, my recent experiences have been disappointing. When I first discovered Natural Squeeze over the summer, I loved it. However, my last four orders have been problematic.

I had previously stopped going because my orders were frequently incorrect. After a few months, I decided to give them another try, hoping for improvement‚Äîbut unfortunately, the issues persist.

I always call ahead to place my order and am given a 10-minute estimate. However, even when I arrive after 20 minutes, I still end up waiting an additional 10 minutes. While the employees are kind, they often seem disorganized and unsure of why there‚Äôs a delay.

I truly hope they can improve their efficiency because I would love to continue supporting this business.
